full_text: Look, if @elonmusk gives me a @Tesla if he buys Twitter then I don’t really give a shit what he does with it.

I demand smiley face stickers given out upon entry to the stadium exclusively by sweet grandmas and grandpas 

Also, let’s bring back those “Roll-Back Prices” on tickets 🎟 
#Broncos #BroncosCountry #NFLTwitter #Walmart #90skid https://t.co/0WpAF4PMte

Idk if #BroncosCountry deserved to go through QB purgatory for six years but damn do I appreciate having a guy like @DangeRussWilson in Denver. 

It feels great to actually be excited for an upcoming season again! I’m even counting down to preseason for once 👀
#Broncos #LetsRide https://t.co/4SgKZbomXL
